summary:
This MOD add one spell named "Sudden Pain" to skip "brawl event".
(If You use the spell, you can win the brawl automatically.)
You can craft the tome by tanning rack.
descriptionHtml:
Skyrim has a problem named "brawl bug".
It is very popular and serious bug.

Long time ago, fix patch was uploaded.
But there are a lot of un-compatible MOD with the patch in nexus , steam workshop and other site.
So I think "brawl event" is no need and they must be skipped in the game.

This MOD add one spell named "Sudden Pain" to skip "brawl event".
(If You use the spell, you can win the brawl automatically.)
You can craft the tome by tanning rack.

If you're disturbed by the "brawl bug", this spell can be settled with this.




Ver. 0.4  Now the spell become more safely for target.

----------------------------------------------------------------------

Manual - How to use "Sudden Pain"

1. Cast the spell "Sudden Pain" to target.

2. Talk target and begin to brawl before 3minute passed.

3. Wait a minute...  target will defeat automatically.

4.You can win the brawl!


( If you use old version 0.1)
1. Cast the spell "Sudden Pain" to target.

2. Talk target and begin to brawl before 3minute passed.

3. Wait a minute...  target will defeat automatically.
   But you must not talk with him until he stands up, or he may be dead.(Important!!)

4. Target will stand up soon later,you can speak target safely.

----------------------------------------------------------------------

Uninstall

Deactivate the esp.
And delete it.
If you use the spell in these times, you had better to wait three minutes passed.
author: SasameSnow
